description: Standard table definitions for DEX aggregators.

tables.label: Tokens
tables.description: List of tokens supported by the protocol.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

token_name.description: The full name of the token, from the eth_call name().

token_symbol.description: The symbol of the token, from the eth_call symbol().

decimals.description: The decimals name of the token, from the eth_call decimals().

tables.label: Token Snapshot
tables.description: Volume, fees, and incentives data at the token level.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

volume_amount.description: The volume amount of the token, during the snapshot period, decimal normalized.

volume_usd.description: The volume of the token in USD.

fees.description: The fees (ie, revenue generated from trading this token) from this token in native, decimal normalized terms.

incentive_amount.description: The amount of incentives collected from this token, during the snapshot period, decimal normalized.

incentive_usd.description: The value of incentives in USD.

tables.label: Protocol Snapshot
tables.description: Volume and fees data at the protocol level.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block this snapshot was taken.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

volume_usd.description: The volume in USD, in the given snapshot period.

fees_usd.description: The fees (ie, total revenue generated in the protocol) collected in USD, during the snapshot period.

tables.label: Trades
tables.description: List of trades executed on the protocol.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain this trade belongs to.

block_number.description: The block number in which the trade occurred.

transaction_hash.description: The transaction hash associated with this trade.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

fees.description: The amount of fees from this trade (ie, the revenue generated from executing this trade).

fees_usd.description: The fees for this trade in USD.

slippage.description: (Optional) The slippage of the given trade, as a percentage (ie, 1.3% slippage is 0.013).

user_address.description: The address of the user initiating the trade.

input_tokens.description: The contract address of the input token(s).

input_token_amounts.description: Parallel array to input_tokens, dictating the normalized native amounts of each token traded.

output_tokens.description: The contract address of the output token(s).

output_token_amounts.description: Parallel array to output_tokens, dictating the normalized native amounts of each token traded.

swap_amount_usd.description: The value of the swap in USD.

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

transaction_signer.description: The address of the account that signed the transaction.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives (could be different from the transaction_signer).

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: (Optional) Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.
